00374 inline IInteractiveShape* CViewBase::GetMouseShapePtr() const
00375 {
00376        if (!m_isMouseShapeValid){
00377               CalcMouseShape();
00378               m_isMouseShapeValid = true;
00379        }
00380        return m_mouseShapePtr;
00381 }

00398 inline int CViewBase::GetLayersCount() const
00399 {

00401 }
00402 
00403 
00404 inline IViewLayer& CViewBase::GetLayer(int index) const
00405 {
00406        if (GetLayersCount() <= 0){
00407               CViewBase* view = const_cast<CViewBase*> (this);
00408               view->InsertDefaultLayers();
00409        }
00410 
00411        Q_ASSERT((index >= 0) && (index < int(m_layers.size())));
00412 
00413        IViewLayer* layerPtr = m_layers[index];
00414        Q_ASSERT(layerPtr != NULL);
00415 
00416        return *layerPtr;
00417 }

00434 inline i2d::CRect CViewBase::GetBoundingBox() const
00435 {
00436        if (!m_isBoundingBoxValid){
00437               m_boundingBox = CalcBoundingBox();
00438 
00439               m_isBoundingBoxValid = true;
00440        }
00441 
00442        return m_boundingBox;
00443 }

00505 
00506 inline void CViewBase::SetBackgroundBufferValid(bool state)
00507 {
00508        if (state != m_isBackgroundBufferValid){
00509               if (!state){
00510                      m_invalidatedBox = GetClientRect();
00511               }
00512               m_isBackgroundBufferValid = state;
00513        }
00514 }
